sentences.english: During the reign of Emperor Taizong there was a minister named Wei Zheng.

sentences.english: Thereupon the emperor hid the young falcon inside his sleeve, thinking to quickly send Weizheng off on some pretext.
sentences.chinese: 于是把小鹰藏在衣袖里，准备早点儿打发魏征走。

sentences.english: Next, we'll talk about Wei Zheng, whom Emperor Taizong feared yet respected.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我们再说那个令唐太宗又敬又畏的魏征。

sentences.english: His minister Wei Zheng gave his the answer.
Since Wei Zheng was gone, I have lost one mirror ever since.

sentences.english: Without Wei Zheng, I lose one mirror.
